  • Simpatico - Simulation Package for Polymer and Molecular Liquids

Mult-System Simulations

These pages discuss how to run simultaneous simulations of more than one system with various programs. The discussion of multi-system simulations in mcSim and mdSim also discusses the use of free energy perturbations and replica exchange simulations.
